amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 509 from the bill which prohibits the use of funds to conduct closure of adjudicatory functions, technical review, or support activities associated with the Yucca Mountain geologic repository license application, or for actions that irrevocably remove the possibility that Yucca Mountain may be a repository option in the future.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike section 509 from the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Titus amendment (A040) Failed by recorded vote: 87 - 337 (Roll no. 337).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Titus amendment (A040) Failed by recorded vote: 87 - 337 (Roll no. 337).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A040) offered by Ms. Titus.
